Package de.ralleytn.simple.input

Interface MouseListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseAdapter

    public interface MouseListener
extends DeviceListener
    Listens to mouse events.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onClick​(MouseEvent event)
      Called when a mouse button was clicked.
      void onDrag​(MouseEvent event)
      Called when the mouse is moved while a button is down.
      void onMove​(MouseEvent event)
      Called when a mouse is moved and not dragged.
      void onRelease​(MouseEvent event)
      Called when a mouse button was released.
      void onScroll​(MouseEvent event)
      Called when the scroll wheel of the mouse was used.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.ralleytn.simple.input.DeviceListener
